title: Probably a very silly question
content:
Hi,  
Can anyone tell me what font does those guys use?  
 [http://www.respeto-total.com/tosvf/imagenes/web\_newdeadline.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080928162502/http:/www.respeto-total.com/tosvf/imagenes/web_newdeadline.jpg "http://www.respeto-total.com/tosvf/imagenes/web\_newdeadline.jpg")  
It looks very familiar but I just can’t recall.  
thanks  
U.

 [‹ Alfa MiTo ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20080928162502/http:/typophile.com/node/44912 "Go to previous forum topic") [Star Trek Teaser Trailer Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080928162502/http:/typophile.com/node/44829 "Go to next forum topic")
author: uriash

comments.content: I stand by my assessment. The bowl of AG’s “a” protrudes a lot more, and the “s” leans the other way.

There’s only one way to settle this.... FIIIIIIIIIIGHT!

Nick Cooke
